name: republication
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of making information or stories available to people in a printed or electronic form again: The republication of the poems to mark the centenary of the poet's death was a big success. The author refused to give permission for the article's republication.
More examplesFewer examplesSince its republication 10 years ago, the book has attracted a whole new readership.The newspaper sued her for unauthorized republication of the content.A further fee will need to be paid in the event of republication.
